amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $5 million and increases funds for research, development, testing and evaluation related to multiple sclerosis under the Defense Health Program by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $5,000,000 and increase funds for the Defense Health Program by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
